body:
This might work out! I will be in Prague in October until this date.  Any idea of costs yet?
-Rob


On 4/28/08 11:36 AM, "Gregory J. Ward" <gregoryjward@gmail.com> wrote:

ANNOUNCING the 7th International Radiance Workshop

Hosted by Rapha?l Compagnon & Greg Ward

This year's Radiance Workshop will be held in Fribourg, Switzerland
October 30th and 31st 2008 at the Ecole d'ing?nieurs et d'architectes
<http://www.eia-fr.ch/><http://www.eia-fr.ch/>.  Save the dates on your calendar, and look
for more details in the upcoming weeks.

Best,
Rapha?l et Greg
